name: Dueling Cannons
description:
Welcome to Dueling Cannons; a game about fast thinking and reaction time. The goal is simple, shoot projectiles as they come towards you to avoid getting hit. The projectiles can spawn anywhere, so be on your toes. You have 4 lives, use them well.

This game is in development, so any and all feedback is needed and appreciated.

*Note - Right click the game and run it in full screen if you are having trouble loading it.*
